author: Dr. Axel Rauschmayer
summary: Published (some time ago) the book on ReasonML. If you are just starting to dive into this beautiful language, then you should definitely buy this book.

author: Repl.it
summary: Added support for ReasonReact applications. Now you can develop ReasonReact apps just from the browser!

author: Zach Wegrzyniak
summary: Wrote an overview article about languages that compile to JS. This includes ReasonML, TypeScript, PureScript.

author: Flavio Corpa
summary: Summarized his experiences after visiting ReasonConf 2018.

author: ReasonConf 2018
summary: Published a new video. This time Vladimir Kurchatkin talks about building native addons for Node.js in ReasonML.

author: Jared Forsyth
summary: A great talk regarding how to correctly 'break' compatibility of your API in packages. Some of this exists in refmt tool, but there is a call for action to create a complete tool.
